text: basic example shows solve common problem:
code: library(libminer)  lib_summary() #>                                                                                        library #> 1                         /Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Versions/4.3-arm64/Resources/library #> 2 /private/var/folders/8t/3l6vpk9x7nl4kq5w25wb17ww0000gn/T/RtmptzjJ83/temp_libpathe7036dcd7810 #> 3                                                                 /Users/stephhazlitt/Rlibrary #>   n_packages #> 1         29 #> 2          1 #> 3        224  # you can also ask it to calculate package sizes: lib_summary(sizes = TRUE) #>                                                                                        library #> 1                         /Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Versions/4.3-arm64/Resources/library #> 2 /private/var/folders/8t/3l6vpk9x7nl4kq5w25wb17ww0000gn/T/RtmptzjJ83/temp_libpathe7036dcd7810 #> 3                                                                 /Users/stephhazlitt/Rlibrary #>   n_packages   lib_size #> 1         29   74731768 #> 2          1      14261 #> 3        224 2103955872
